Home.title: It's not just a website,
Home.desc: If you want to make the most of the benefits that an online presence can offer, I'm here to help turn that vision into reality.

About.desc: Since 2021 I have been studying programming constantly. I've always been interested in IT and working with computers, so when I discovered web development I was hooked right away. For me, programming is like a super power, I think it's incredible that we can create projects from 0 to the end, that's why I love my work and I really enjoy studying about it. I can't imagine doing anything other than programming.
